breakingChanges.notes: Groups and outliner hierarchy are saved as separate fields; keyframe value direction fixed.
Relative texture paths saved relative to file directory; project name ignored/overwritten when loaded from file; default textures not assigned per face unless explicit.
per_texture_uv_size introduces per-texture UV width/height in bbmodel.

bbmodel.notes: The bbmodel format is not fully specified; refer to Blockbench source (bbmodel.js) for canonical behavior.

java_block.name: Java Block/Item
java_block.notes: Capabilities are assumed; prefer live Format API when available.

geckolib.name: GeckoLib
geckolib.notes: Capabilities are assumed; prefer live Format API when available.

animated_java.name: Animated Java
animated_java.notes: Capabilities are assumed; prefer live Format API when available.

free.name: Generic Model
free.notes: Capabilities align with Blockbench generic format definition.

image.name: Image
image.notes: 2D image editor format with edit_mode disabled and image_editor enabled.

sources.name: Blockbench Texture API (getUVWidth/getUVHeight)
sources.note: UV size depends on per_texture_uv_size vs project texture resolution.

sources.name: Blockbench generic format source
sources.note: free format enables meshes, armature_rig, bone_rig, per_texture_uv_size, animation_mode.

sources.name: Blockbench image format source
sources.note: image format enables image_editor and disables edit mode.

sources.name: Blockbench releases (latest version)
sources.note: Latest tagged release used for blockbench.version.
